Subskills.name: Sharpened Dash
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by scimitar charge.

Subskills.name: Whirling Radius
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of scimitar charge.

Subskills.name: Scimitar Storm
Subskills.description: Throw multiple scimitars in a circle around you on hit.

Subskills.name: Lethal Reach
Subskills.description: Increases the traveling distance of scimitar charge.

Subskills.name: Dashing Reflexes
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using scimitar charge.

Subskills.name: Keep the Distance
Subskills.description: Knock monsters back dealing increased damage on hit.

Subskills.name: Deadly Rush
Subskills.description: Increases travel speed when using scimitar charge.

Subskills.name: Mind Over Matter
Subskills.description: Decreases the mana cost of scimitar charge.

Subskills.name: Phantom Charge
Subskills.description: Mark the point of impact sending phantom nomads from random directions towards the mark casting scimitar charge for a short period.

Subskills.name: Doubleslash
Subskills.description: Chance to swirl an additional time on hit.

Subskills.name: Debilitating Swirl
Subskills.description: Chance to stun monsters on hit.

Subskills.name: Unhinged Slash
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Slow Painful Death
Subskills.description: Deal a portion of your damage as bleeding with increased effectiveness.

Subskills.name: Static Blade Vortex
Subskills.description: Scimitar charge now slows enemies on hit leaving behind a pulsating whirl for a short period.
